items.summary: Add a new landing-page UI block placed immediately above the existing ASCII 'KARM' text section that visually matches/blends with the current website style (black background + monochrome glass). The block must resemble the provided React Native `AnalyticsScreen` layout (header + central deck/cards feel), but implemented in the existing React + Tailwind codebase.

Display fake (hard-coded) stats in the new analytics block: Level = 23, Karm = (23*3600), Habits = 4, Challenges = 24. Use these exact values and show Karm as a computed number (not the expression string).

Implement the blended background/atmosphere for the new analytics block using existing site patterns (e.g., optional subtle snow dots) and ensure it respects reduced-motion preferences similarly to the existing `SnowDotsBackground` effect.

Wire the new analytics block into the existing landing page composition by updating the relevant section/component(s) so the placement is 'just above the ASCII text' without altering unrelated sections.
